articles.title: South Africa's genocide case against Israel: Both sides play heavy on emotion in ICJ hearing - BBC.com
articles.description: After two days of legal argument, judges must now rule on whether Israel is committing genocide in Gaza.
articles.content:
Pro-Israeli and pro-Palestinian protesters gathered near the ICJ in the Hague to watch the proceedings
The UN's top legal body has now heard two days of powerful legal argument on the "crime of all … [+5891 chars]

articles.author: Saurav Mukherjee
articles.title: Israel rejects South Africa's 'genocide' charges at ICJ hearing, says it is 'fighting a war', | Mint - Mint
articles.description: At the International Court of Justice in The Hague, Israeli lawyer Tal Becker argued that Israel was in a war of defence against Hamas, not against the Palestinian people.
articles.content: Israel on January 12 said South Africa distorted the truth in its case to the International Court of Justice (ICJ) in The Hague to force it to immediately suspend" its military operations in Gaza. So… [+3345 chars]
